title: Bananas in pyjamas: it's music time!
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Helena Harris, Sophia Turkiewicz and Tony Tilse
brief_description: B1 and B2 and their friends the Teddies embark on eight terrific adventures. Includes two fun filled songs as well as the famous “Bananas in pyjamas” signature song. All the episodes have a musical theme.
creator_credit_for_label: ABC-TV (Australia), Helena Harris, Sophia Turkiewicz and Tony Tilse
